metadata.title: Reggie - Spoiler-Free NBA Guide
metadata.description: Find out which NBA games are worth watching, spoiler-free. Pre and post-game analysis for basketball fans.

teams.title: NBA Teams
teams.pageDescription: Explore all NBA teams and their game analyses on Reggie.

methodology.title: How it works
methodology.intro: Reggie analyzes every NBA game to tell you which ones are truly worth watching, without ever spoiling the result.

prematch.title: Pre-game Analysis
prematch.subtitle: Before the game, we evaluate its potential on 3 criteria:

stakes.label: Stakes
stakes.description: Impact on standings, historic rivalries, importance of the matchup.

stars.label: Star Power
stars.description: Presence of star players and quality of expected matchups.

form.label: Recent Form
form.description: Team momentum over the last 10 games.

postmatch.title: Post-game Analysis
postmatch.subtitle: After the game, we evaluate what actually happened:

stakes.label: Stakes
stakes.description: Confirmed context and importance of the game.

methodology.footer: Scores range from 0 to 100. Above 80 is epic. Between 70-80 is a must watch. Between 50-70 is worth it. Below 50, you can skip.
